name: THE SPLIT (BigDonko)
description:
This game is made for a Game Jam!

The Split features 17 Levels for you to play!

To complete a level, you  must make each blobs go to their respective portals on their respective sides and stay there until both blobs are on their portals.

also, turn off that annoying sound!

CONTROLS = {

W : JUMP

A : MOVE LEFT

S : MOVE RIGHT

}

If you encounter any problems please leave it in the comments!

TIME OF DEVELOPMENT : 5 Days

THEME OF JAM : Opposite ( The game has 2 blobs on opposite sides with opposite controls!)
